knimeNode.name: Archive Binary Objects
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node archives a binary object column using the selective archiving algorithm

intro.p: This node archives a binary object column using the selected algorithm. Some algorithms (e.g. 'zip') include compression, others (e.g. 'tar') do not A second column provides paths within the resulting archive. The output table will contain a single Binary Object column containing only one row. Where the format supports it, paths ending '/' or '\' will be treated as directories, otherwise they will be skipped
Warning - Duplicate entries in the Archive Path Column will result in node failure
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select the incoming binary object column
a column containing paths for individual files within the archive

option.name: Archive Entry Last Modified Time Options

fullDescription.option: The timestamp for the 'last modified' time of each archive entry. Can either be the local time when the node is executing, an input legacy Date and time column, and new Local Date and Time column, of a fixed time from the dialog
Other options specific to the selective archive format

ports.outPort: The input table with the resulting archive
